feed.title: Dynamically Controlled Bitcoin Block Size Max Cap

entry.title: Dynamically Controlled Bitcoin Block Size Max Cap
entry.summary: The author of the given context has attempted to resolve the issue surrounding the maximum block size debate. They have based their solution on the calculation of the previous block size. The author also requests comments on their approach, which can be provided through the link http://upalc.com/maxblocksize.php. It is important to note that no further information is provided in the context and therefore it is difficult to determine the exact nature of the maximum block size debate that the author is referring to.
